channel.title: Diderik | Behavioural Scientist Blog
channel.description: Thoughts on human decision making and digital interventions.

item.title: The Architecture of Choice
item.description: Ever noticed how the snacks at eye level are always the ones you grab? That's not an accident.

item.title: Digital Minimalism in a Hyper-connected World
item.description: Six hours a day on screens? Yep, we've all been there. Here's how to take back your attention.

item.title: The Sunk Cost Fallacy: Why Quitting is a Superpower
item.description: Ever stayed in a bad movie just because you paid for the ticket? You're not alone.
